description: Amendment to Planning Permssion ref 00/00431/FUL (Part demolition and extension of existing building to provide 62 self contained flats and leisure use, with associated parking and landscaping granted 30/10/2001), including elevation changes, alterations to internal areas, relocation of sub-station, alterations to top 4th floor area and roof and addition of lift overuns, smoke vents and railings.
